name: Hall of Oracles
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T} Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

name: Pilgrim of the Ages
oracle_text:
When Pilgrim of the Ages enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{6}: Return Pilgrim of the Ages from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Soothsayer Adept
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: One of the first lessons divination students learn is how to recognize the difference between a portent and a simple surface ripple.

name: Time Shredder
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on Time Shredder.
flavor_text:
"Quintorius, would you care to explain why you didn't complete your homework?"
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Bookwurm
oracle_text:
Trample
When Bookwurm enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and draw a card.
{2}{G}: Put Bookwurm from your graveyard into your library third from the top.
flavor_text: It takes "devouring a book in one sitting" to frightening extreme.

name: Mascot Interception
oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature token.
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Far from the trappings of royalty, Rowan and Will found inspiration from the most popular sport on campus, Mage Tower.

name: Mentor's Guidance
oracle_text:
When you cast this spell, copy it if you control a planeswalker, Cleric, Druid, Shaman, Warlock, or Wizard.
Scry 1, then draw a card.
flavor_text: Kasmina had encouraged the twins to apply. Strixhaven would test not only their magical potential, but also their character.

name: Detention Vortex
oracle_text:
Enchant nonland permanent
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
{3}: Destroy Detention Vortex. Only your opponents may activate this ability and only as a sorcery.

name: Novice Dissector
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "The professor said to first extract the venom glands, then the acid sac. Next up, the . . . meeping organ?"

name: Mascot Exhibition
oracle_text: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying, a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token, and a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
flavor_text:
"Don't just win the game. Win the crowd."
—Moriana, Mage Tower coach

name: Mascot Exhibition
oracle_text: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying, a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token, and a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.

name: Exponential Growth
oracle_text: Until end of turn, double target creature's power X times.

name: Symmetry Sage
oracle_text:
Flying
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, target creature you control has base power 2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "By my calculations, I should be able to achieve true enlightenment before graduation."

name: Exponential Growth
oracle_text: Until end of turn, double target creature's power X times.

name: Vanishing Verse
oracle_text: Exile target monocolored permanent.
flavor_text: "Whoever summoned that thing had better confess right this moment, or the whole class will be cleaning the ink receptacles for a month."

name: Promising Duskmage
oracle_text: When Promising Duskmage dies, if it had a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Your technique is sloppy, but there is talent there. Do it again, and keep your right arm in position this time."

card_faces.name: Selfless Glyphweaver
card_faces.oracle_text: Exile Selfless Glyphweaver: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
card_faces.flavor_text: He offered his light to make sure no others would be dimmed.

card_faces.name: Deadly Vanity
card_faces.oracle_text: Choose a creature or planeswalker, then destroy all other creatures and planeswalkers.
card_faces.flavor_text: She cast a spell to purge all weakness. When the ink cleared, she alone stood.

name: Killian, Ink Duelist
oracle_text:
Lifelink
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Spells you cast that target a creature cost {2} less to cast.
flavor_text: "When your father is Dean Embrose, second best really isn't an option."

name: Mavinda, Students' Advocate
oracle_text:
Flying
{O}: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that spell doesn't target a creature you control, it costs {8} more to cast this way. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. (You still pay the spell's costs. Timing rules for the spell still apply.)

name: Silverquill Campus
oracle_text:
Silverquill Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students drawn to the power of language choose Silverquill, the college of eloquence.

name: Silverquill Pledgemage
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Silverquill Pledgemage gains your choice of flying or lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I avoid violence. It is the last resort of the witless. But if you insist, I'll make an exception for you."

name: Mila, Crafty Companion // Lukka, Wayward Bonder
type_line: Legendary Creature — Fox // Legendary Planeswalker — Lukka

card_faces.name: Mila, Crafty Companion
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent attacks one or more planeswalkers you control, put a loyalty counter on each planeswalker you control.
Whenever a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability and opponent controls, you may draw a card.

card_faces.name: Lukka, Wayward Bonder
card_faces.oracle_text:
+1: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. If a creature card was discarded this way, draw two cards instead.
−2: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of your next upkeep.
−7: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to any target."

name: Blot Out the Sky
oracle_text: Create X tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature tokens with flying. If X is 6 or more, destroy all noncreature, nonland permanents.
flavor_text: A drop of ink is a nuisance. A torrent of inklings is a menace.

name: Humiliate
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.
flavor_text: "Aw, what's that? No comeback?"

name: Blot Out the Sky
oracle_text: Create X tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature tokens with flying. If X is 6 or more, destroy all noncreature, nonland permanents.

name: Exhilarating Elocution
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: His words poured forth on waves of golden light, scouring all fear from his audience's hearts and minds.

name: Moldering Karok
oracle_text: Trample, lifelink
flavor_text: Necroluminescence is common among the undead creatures of Sedgemoor, giving the midnight swamp an eerie glow. It's comforting—from a distance.

name: Gnarled Professor
oracle_text:
Trample
When Gnarled Professor enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: "Class is in season."

name: Shadewing Laureate
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature you control with flying dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: "Would you prefer I destroy you with prose or verse?"

name: "Would you like to buy a face?"
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Learn.

name: "Croaktara"
oracle_text:
Flash
When "Croaktara" enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

name: Inkling Summoning
oracle_text: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
flavor_text:
"Think of an insult so vicious, so vulgar, that you hesitate to speak it aloud. The strongest, most aggressive inklinks are born from such scorn."
—Embrose, Silverquill dean

name: Access Tunnel
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Target creature with power 3 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Oriq agents stick to the dark corners of Arcavios, unseen yet ever-present.

name: Umbral Juke
oracle_text:
Choose one: —
• Target player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
• Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
flavor_text: The sport of Mage Tower was conceived as a playful testing ground for young spellcasters.

name: Secret Rendezvous
oracle_text: You and target opponent each draw three cards.
flavor_text: Strixhaven's five colleges encourage natural rivalries among the students, but some bonds transcend all barriers.

name: Owlin Shieldmage
oracle_text:
Flying
Ward—Pay 3 life (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)
flavor_text: "Aim higher next time."

name: Devastating Mastery
oracle_text:
You may pay {2}{W}{W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {2}{W}{W} cost was paid, an opponent choses up to two nonland permanents they control and returns them to their owner's hand.
Destroy all nonland permanents.

name: "Silverquill AristoCAN'T"
oracle_text:
As "Silverquill AristoCAN'T" enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell with the chosen name, that player loses 3 life and you draw a card.

name: "Silverquill Bully"
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
"Silverquill Bully" enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
When "Silverquill Bully" dies, put its counters on target creature you control.

name: "Library Strix"
oracle_text:
Flying
When "Library Strix" becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.
When "Library Strix" dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: "Unstable Transformation"
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target nonland permanent loses all abilities and becomes your choice of a Frog creature with base power and toughness 1/1 or an Octopus creature with base power and toughness 4/4.

name: "Superior Talents"
oracle_text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and/or library for any number of cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. That spell's controller shuffles, then they draw a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

name: Closing Statement
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast during your end step.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker you don't control. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
flavor_text: "In Conclusion..."

name: Dramatic Finale
oracle_text:
Creature Tokens you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control die, create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor_text: The enraptured audience barely noticed their programs were suddenly blank.

name: Necrotic Fumes
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature you control.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: When live speciments aren't readily available, Witherbloom mages make use of ragged spirits clinging to long-dead bodies.

name: Basic Conjuration
oracle_text: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "I made that! It's one! Did you see that?"

name: Eureka Moment
oracle_text: Draw two cards. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "At first, the equations were simply numbers. But in those numbers, I saw a story, and in that story I saw a pattern, and suddenly it all fit together!"

name: Accomplished Alchemist
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
flavor_text: "Tincture of murkroot and lizard feet? Simple. One that doesn't take like murkroot and lizard feet? I'm working on it."

name: Emergent Sequence
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. That land becomes a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature that's still a land. Put a +1/+1 counter on it for each land you had enter the battlefield under your control this turn.
